title: thereisnospoonz
author: thereisnospoonz
created_time: September 14, 2023, 02:13:51 AMLast edit: September 17, 2023, 02:52:31 PM by thereisnospoonz
content: Hi.I'm representing Coinstore (CEX) Headquarters located at Singapore, a fast-growing global crypto exchange that has footprints in Asia-pacific region. (Indonesia, Vietnam, India, Thailand, etc)What we usually do for listing are stated below:Pre-listing buzz: Banners, announcements- Listing of $_ token- Post-listing promotion: Trading, expos, campaigns- Introduce staking for community excitementThis cost-effective plan boosts sentiment and exposure. Benefits: • Consistent presence during market cycles • Young, growing CEX (check our LinkedIn) • Access Asia-Pacific users (3.6M registered) • Exposure at Crypto Expos for VCs, investors, projectsIf you're interested and would like to know more on the above stated, Do PM me. I'll verify myself when you DM.Cheers!

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: thereisnospoonz on September 14, 2023, 02:13:51 AMI'm representing Coinstore (CEX) Headquarters located at Singapore, a fast-growing global crypto exchange that has footprints in Asia-pacific region. (Indonesia, Vietnam, India, Thailand, etc)How can we verify this? Can you add a link to your forum account to any of the verified Coinstore (CEX) accounts?Do you list any currency as long as it pays more or do you have standards? I did not see that you mentioned any standards or conditions to prevent listing, and how many amounts you request or the minimum.I read many reviews about Coinstore and they all talk about either glitching or difficulties with the site’s stability and withdrawal.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on September 14, 2023, 10:13:08 AM-snip-Most of the time, it's just an affiliated person.Most of exchanges have this army, floating to offering a listing on community projects, especially on telegram. You can always ask with their support-staff on telegram/website about the legitimacy of the affiliated person.They get a small % reward, if successfully bring some project to their exchange.

comments.author: thereisnospoonz

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: It seems a new platform. Do you have any existing clients or projects that has been listed on their IEO?  For now theres not much traction on IEO aside from top exchanges like Binance and Kucoin since most platform offers ido are in the midst of losing streak due to market conditions. Even famous platform before got some projects but failed to have a top performance when they open the project to trading markets. How good is this platform?

comments.author: thereisnospoonz
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on September 15, 2023, 06:32:31 AMIt seems a new platform. Do you have any existing clients or projects that has been listed on their IEO?  For now theres not much traction on IEO aside from top exchanges like Binance and Kucoin since most platform offers ido are in the midst of losing streak due to market conditions. Even famous platform before got some projects but failed to have a top performance when they open the project to trading markets. How good is this platform? Hi, really appreciate your response and your interest with us.You can visit our website and look through the Launchpad section, you can see our past successful projects and also the amount we raised for the projects.And yes, despite the rough market conditions, Coinstore still manages to thrive, we're pushing out Coinstore's name out with our recent booths on Token2049 at both level 4 & level 5.  If you have any projects do reach out to me.Cheers!

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: Can you send me a link? Like your website link and your LinkedIN link? I am interested in your marketing because I also happen to be from Asia Pacific. Why don't you just introduce yourself here? Like it doesn't need to be your real self but yourself as part of Coinstore. Sometimes some people are lazy to interact by PM.
